title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. In the 'Export' dialog window, select both projects created earlier.
2. Give the zip file a name (such as test.zip) and begin export to zip file.

Observed Behavior:
Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails. An error message box pops up, stating that problems were encountered during export. The detail lists the file of the same name in project2 as the problem (i.e., 'foo.txt' in project 2).

Expected Behavior:
The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
2. Select the projects created earlier.
3. Enter a name for the zip file.
4. Click the 'Export' button.
